channel.title: Firefox + Myspace = DISASTER?!
channel.description:
But really, in firefox some images on myspace don't show up, but in google chrome and ie they do..
http://i34.tinypic.com/2d1o8ki.png

item.title: Firefox + Myspace = DISASTER?!
item.dc:creator: @akl akl
item.description:
@akl wrote:

^ Exactly.
Facebook is professional, tbh, it’s gay having to look at custom profiles.
Most of the shit has harsh colors and it’s like just stupid.

Read full topic

item.title: Firefox + Myspace = DISASTER?!
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

[quote=“maminerr, post:10, topic:304619”]try letting it load longer :s
i always use firefox and i never have a problem :3

also
myspace isnt for immature teens etc, all those ‘immature teens’ have facebook’s aswell,
if anything myspace is more complex and better for people who enjoy web design as they can customize their profile by coding it themself or the help of others.[/quote]Too bad it has the worst layout known to man

Read full topic

i always use firefox and i never have a problem :3

also

item.title: Firefox + Myspace = DISASTER?!

item.description:
@cumescape wrote:

[quote=“Starting up …, post:1, topic:304619”]But really, in firefox some images on myspace don’t show up, but in google chrome and ie they do…

http://i34.tinypic.com/2d1o8ki.png[/quote]The problem is you only have 3 friends online so therefore MySpace is like FFFFUUU!!!

Read full topic

item.title: Firefox + Myspace = DISASTER?!
item.dc:creator: @Not_X_A_Alex Not X A Alex
item.description:
@Not_X_A_Alex wrote:

[quote=“inertia, post:6, topic:304619”]Myspace is really just for kids, immature teens and low exposure bands, admittedly with a few exceptions.

Facebook tends to attract more mature people, although there are again exceptions. The only advantage of Myspace is that you can completely customize your profile, which can still be viewed as a disadvantage - do your mates really want to hear your latest favorite song and be blinded by horrible colours expressing how indie you are?[/quote]

[quote=“akl, post:5, topic:304619”]Myspace sucks.
I like Facebook, but I guess there’s something about Myspace that keeps you guys drifting, I hear custom profiles?[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Firefox + Myspace = DISASTER?!
item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

probably not loading right.

I use myspace/facebook with no problems.

youtube on the other hand…

Read full topic

item.title: Firefox + Myspace = DISASTER?!
item.dc:creator: @inertia inertia
item.description:
@inertia wrote:

[quote=“akl, post:5, topic:304619”]Myspace sucks.
I like Facebook, but I guess there’s something about Myspace that keeps you guys drifting, I hear custom profiles?[/quote]
Myspace is really just for kids, immature teens and low exposure bands, admittedly with a few exceptions.

Facebook tends to attract more mature people, although there are again exceptions. The only advantage of Myspace is that you can completely customize your profile, which can still be viewed as a disadvantage - do your mates really want to hear your latest favorite song and be blinded by horrible colours expressing how indie you are?

Read full topic
